href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/sul-do-rio-costa-verde/noticia/2017/03/projeto-ensina-moradores-andar-de-bicicleta-em-volta-redonda-rj.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Projeto ensina moradores a andar de bicicleta em Volta Redonda</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ação do coletivo Bike Anjo acontece na Radial Leste.
Cerca de 25 voluntários participarão da atividade, a partir das 7h.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="3"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico no-image"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">paty do alferes</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 10 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/sul-do-rio-costa-verde/noticia/2017/03/homem-e-assassinado-em-casa-no-bairro-poaia-em-paty-do-alferes-rj.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Homem é assassinado em casa no bairro Poaia</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Suspeitos armados e encapuzados invadiram a residência, diz polícia.
Corpo da vítima foi levado para IML de Barra do Piraí.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="4"><div><div         (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-3a1f6c29-6bac-4490-a7d0-87ff3a6e81c4');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://g1.globo.com/rj/sul-do-rio-costa-verde/vc-no-g1-tv-rio-sul/enviar-noticia.html" class="gui-card-title-link" title="Participe">

       class="link-plantao">últimas notícias</a></div></div><div id="glb-rodape" class="widget_rodape_container"><!-- Box Card de Vídeos G1 - Adiciona estilos do G1 ao Box Card de Vídeos --></div><div id="glb-rodape" class="widget_rodape_container"><div class="footer product-color" data-ga-area="footer"><div class="grid-12 container row clearfix" data-ga-marker="links"><div class="column"><ul class="first-line"><li class="ib middle"><a class="logo" href="//globo.com/" title="Globo.com">Globo.com</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//g1.globo.com/">g1</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globoesporte.globo.com/">globoesporte</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//gshow.globo.com/">gshow</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//famosos.globo.com/">famosos & etc</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globotv.globo.com/">vídeos</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//www.globo.com/todos-os-sites.html">todos os sites</a></li><li class="pushed ib middle"><span>Globo Notícias</span></li></ul><span class="pull-left">&copy;                   media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 18:37:06 --></html>
